name: pact
description: Guidance for Pact contract testing framework in .NET. USE FOR: consumer-driven contract testing, verifying API compatibility between microservices, preventing breaking API changes, generating and verifying Pact files, provider state management, CI/CD integration with Pact Broker. DO NOT USE FOR: end-to-end testing (use Playwright), unit testing (use xUnit with Moq), load testing, or testing internal implementation details.
author: Tyler-R-Kendrick
